price: Tí (Allāhu) bá bèèrè rẹ̀ ní ọwọ́ yín (pé, kí ẹ fi gbogbo rẹ̀ yọ Zakāh), tí Ó sì won̄koko mọ yín, ẹ máa ṣahun. Ó sì máa mú àrùn ọkàn yín jadé (àṣírí yín yó sì tú síta).
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum
translations: He were to ask you for it
